column5: This newly renovated 2 bedroom, 2 bath 1900 sq. foot home located on the San Bernard River has beautiful views, great fishing, excellent water sports, and is the perfect place to relax! It is also near the beach & offshore fishing. Bring your boat or PWC to cruise the river or enjoy the area's best wakeboarding, tubing, and skiing. Ideal location for a weekend getaway from the city, winter Texans, summer vacationers, or temporary workers in the area.
column8: Relaxing on the River - Newly Renovated
